(61207, 64517).description: A long-term change in the Earth's climate, caused by human activities and natural processes, which can have significant impacts on ecosystems and species interactions

(61207, 64517).name: thermal tolerance
(61207, 64517).label: variable
(61207, 64517).description: The ability of an organism to withstand and adapt to changes in temperature, which can be affected by climate change and ocean acidification

(61207, 64517).name: ecosystem
(61207, 64517).label: location
(61207, 64517).description: A community of living and non-living components that interact with each other in a specific environment, which can be affected by climate change and ocean acidification

(64034, 64670).name: European Project On Ocean Acidification
(64034, 64670).label: project
(64034, 64670).description: A research project focused on studying the impacts of ocean acidification on marine ecosystems and species>

(64034, 64670).name: Biological Impacts Of Ocean Acidification
(64034, 64670).label: project
(64034, 64670).description: A research project investigating the effects of ocean acidification on marine biological systems>

(64034, 64670).name: AWI research program PACES
(64034, 64670).label: project
(64034, 64670).description: A research program of the Alfred Wegener Institute focused on studying the polar regions and their role in the Earth's climate system>

(64034, 64670).name: ocean acidification
(64034, 64670).label: variable
(64034, 64670).description: A decrease in the pH level of the ocean due to increased absorption of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere>

(64034, 64670).name: species interactions
(64034, 64670).label: variable
(64034, 64670).description: The relationships and interactions between different species within an ecosystem>
